content:
Set Up Customer Service Incident Management

Customer Service Incident Management is automatically enabled for all orgs created after the Winter â€™22 release.

Enable Customer Service Incident Management:
Turn on in a few steps and track, diagnose, and prevent service interruptions.
Give Users Access to Customer Service Incident Management:
Assign user profiles access to incidents, problems, and change requests.
Automate with Customer Service Incident Management:
Seamlessly resolve issues with automation tools.
Set Up Customer Service Incident Management Integrations:
Integrate with partner systems to identify potential issues.
Add Related Items to Your Incident and Case Page Layouts:
See case-related incidents, problems, and change requests from the case record.
Report On Customer Service Incident Management:
Track how many incidents, problems, and change requests were created and closed.
title: Setting Up Customer Service Incident Management
